description: Try our easy to follow Baked Tortillas With Tuna, Avocado And Tzatziki recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Tortillas With Tuna, Avocado And Tzatziki Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 180g John West Protein+ Calcium Rich Tuna Olive Oil Blend, drained
0.25 bunch mint, leaves picked, finely chopped
0.5 avocado, deseeded, cut into thick wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fanforced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Place tortillas on tray. Using a fork, prick 5 times, then spray with oil. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden and crisp. Set aside for 5 minutes to cool.
Meanwhile, combine mint, garlic, oil and lemon juice in a small bowl.
Spread each tortilla with tzatziki. Top with avocado, tuna, tomato and onion. Season with pepper. Drizzle over mint mixture, and serve.
